feed.title: Category: Review | Freelance .NET Web Developer in Mumbai

entry.title: GetSiteControl : One-Stop Place for Website Widgets
entry.content:
Few weeks back I happened to visit a website called www.getsitecontrol.com by chance. It has awesome features which every website needs for marketing purposes and for connecting with their target audience by creating widgets like a Survey Widget for conducting an online survey, Contact Widget for getting user feedbacks and suggestions, Promo Widgets for promoting offers and discounts to clients, Subscribe Widget for newsletter subscriptions, Follow and Share Widgets for getting social media exposure.

I am happy that I found www.getsitecontrol.com for creating and managing widgets for my website.

Visit www.getsitecontrol.com now to get these AWESOME Widgets for your website.
